Title: Convention
Writer: Sean Gray (teleplay by), David Quantick (teleplay by), Armando Iannucci (story by), Sean Gray (story by), David Quantick (story by), Armando Iannucci (created by)
Actors: Julia Louis-Dreyfus, Anna Chlumsky, Tony Hale, Reid Scott
Plot: Selina and her staff scramble to avert a major internal crisis; Amy is angry with a new advisor.
